damayanthi paranagama mahathmiya dab. em. aar. ranjith mahatha nirosha hapuhinna mahathmiya athireka disthrik lekam(idam) disthrik lekam ha athireka disthrik lekamge magapenwima matha disthrikkaye paripalana kriyakarakam udesa abhyanthara paripalana katayuthuda prashastha lesa itukirima dab. ee. aruna shanthapriya mahatha disthrikkaye sanwardhana, subhasadhana, hadisi aapada paripalanamaya katayuthu prashastha mattamaka pawathwagena yama sandaha mulya kalamanakaranaya kirima saha mulyamaya wartha thulin janathawata siyalu mulyamaya wagakim itu kirima em. ke. tiyushan mahatha rajya prathipaththinwalata anukulawa rajya mulya kalamanakaranaye paladayithawa saha karyakshamathawa prashastha mattamaka pawathwa ganima sandaha disthrikkaye paripalanamaya ha sanwardhana katayuthu itu kirimata awashya mulya wagakima itu kirima thulin mahajanathawata uparima sewayak sapayadime yuthukama ha wagakima itu kirima aar. em. es. udayangani wijayarathna mahathmiya yu. di. pi. em. yasanayaka menewiya bi. ech. hasan mahatha dab. em. pi. wijayabandara mahatha samruddhi adhyaksha em. em. em. musammil mahatha dab. em. ke. dab. aar. ke. wirasekara sahakara pupurana drawya palaka

meyin boho dena labana 5 - 6 dedina namayojana baradima sidu karanu atha.basnahira palath sabhawa wenuwen kolambaa disthrikkayata manthri niyojithayan 40 kda, gampaha disthrikkayata da manthri niyojithayan 40 k saha kaluthara disthrikkayata manthri niyojithayan 22 kda washayen mulu manthri sankhyawa 102 kda galla disthrikkayata manthriwaru 22 kda mathara disthrikkayata manthriwaru 17 k saha hambanthota disthrikkayata da manthriwaru 14 kda bagin manthri dakunu palath sabhawata manthriwaru 53 kda path wanu atha.kese namuth kolambaa gampaha kaluthara yana disthrikka thunata deshapalana pakshayakin ho swadhina kandayamakin idiripath wi tharaga karanne nam apekshakayan 111 dena bagin basnahira palath sabhawata da galla mathara saha hambanthota yana disthrikka thunen deshapalana pakshayakin ha swadhina kandayamakin apekshakayan 62 bagin tharaga kirimata da nama yojana bara denu atha.basnahira ha dakunu palath sabha deka sandaha namayojana labana 6 wanida madhyahna 12 n awasan we.
